text: ==Events== * July 22 – English under the Duke of Buckingham invade the Ré Island in support of the Huguenots in La Rochelle. The invasion does not go well. * A Dutch ship makes the first recorded sighting of the coast of South Australia. * The aurochs are hunted to extinction, the last being killed by poachers in Poland. * England places the first European settlers on Barbados. * Siege of La Rochelle begins * Korea becomes a tributary state of China
